mapper.update: update board set BOARD_REPLY_SEQ = BOARD_REPLY_SEQ+1 where board_reply_seq > (select board_reply_seq from board where board_num = #{boardNum}) and BOARD_REF = (select BOARD_REF from board where board_num = #{boardNum})
mapper.select: select BOARD_NUM,BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_ORIGINAL_FILENAME, BOARD_RENAME_FILENAME,BOARD_DATE , BOARD_LEVEL, BOARD_REF, BOARD_REPLY_SEQ,BOARD_READCOUNT from board order by board_ref desc, board_reply_seq asc
